channel.title: No response from server please try using a different world
channel.description:
hey guys,
so my problem is everytime i try to loggin into my client i get error. i've got my ip on the client 127.0.0.1 and im running the server perfectly so could anyone tell me what the problem .. here's a picture: [img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/768/dfdsfdsfdddd.png[/img]
and .. i have visited other 4 sited and none can help me . hope u can thx
and when i check my server status it says it's online . and i have portforwarded and everything ... :S
[size=10pt][b]oh and if u think u can fix it ill let u teamview me :)[/b][/size]
thx

item.title: No response from server please try using a different world
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“mkti1, post:9, topic:451719”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=554606.msg4062501#msg4062501 date=1343535407]

yep turns out im not ip banned .

lol … and i got this server from like 1 year ago … but i worked hard on it.

so yea… anyone?

No you didn’t work hard on it… Why would you say that?
[/quote]
i did work alot on it to fix glitches and bugs and to edit things even tho the source is leeched…[/quote]
Working hard on it means doing something creative, all I see here is a PI source that was leeched. If you’ve done something creative or productive please prove it.

Read full topic

item.title: No response from server please try using a different world
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:4, topic:451719”][quote author=mkti1 link=topic=554606.msg4061908#msg4061908 date=1343502981]
hey guys,

so my problem is everytime i try to loggin into my client i get error.
i’ve got my ip on the client 127.0.0.1 and im running the server perfectly so could anyone tell me what the problem …
here’s a picture:

and … i have visited other 4 sited and none can help me . hope u can thx

and when i check my server status it says it’s online . and i have portforwarded and everything … :S

[size=12pt]ohohohoh and i just thought that it might be one of my admins … ip banned me . and i dont know how to unipban . please tell me[/size]

[size=10pt]oh and if u think u can fix it ill let u teamview me [/size]

thx
[/quote]
Why do you have a server if you don’t know how to remove your name from the ipban list?[/quote]
Probably a leech, for money.

Read full topic

item.title: No response from server please try using a different world
item.dc:creator: @NieX NieX
item.description:
@NieX wrote:

this is client sided, check your ip and your port located in either your GUI (graphical user interface) or your client.java

Read full topic
item.source: No response from server please try using a different world

item.title: No response from server please try using a different world
item.dc:creator: @newman0071 newman0071
item.description:
@newman0071 wrote:

if you think your ip banned just simply go into your files and find ipbans.txt or ip banned.txt
basically anything rhat may say ipbanned and enter the file. now after entering the file if there are lots of names press ctrl+f and type in your username. if theres not alot of names just find it manually. after you find it just remove it, save the file and compile.

Read full topic
